description: Birmingham City maintain their lead at the top of the League One table with victory over Exeter City.
title: Birmingham City 1-0 Exeter City
title_page: League One: Birmingham City 1-0 Exeter City - BBC Sport
maintext:
Birmingham City have won three of their last four Football League games against Exeter City (L1), including a 2-0 victory in the reverse fixture this season in November.
Exeter City are winless in their two previous trips to Birmingham City in the Football League (D1 L1), with this their first such visit since a 1-0 defeat in the third tier in November 1991.
Birmingham are unbeaten across their last 13 home league games (W10 D3), last enjoying a longer run on home soil between March and December 2018 (15 games).
Exeter have lost each of their last two league games and will be looking to avoid losing three in succession for the first time since October 2023 (run of six).
